about_the_game:
A Book of Indonesian Ghosts


Indonesia consists of many provinces, connecting many tribes from the far west to the furthest east. Indonesia’s culture is very rich in diversity, from the ethnicities to the values adapted in its daily lives, including their horror stories and types of ghosts.

This book will guide its readers to the more in-depth understanding of popular Indonesian ghosts by providing a thorough explanation on each chosen ghosts.

“A Book of Indonesian Ghosts” introduces 30 of the most popular ghosts in Indonesia, starting from their origin, appearance, up to the trivia about the ghosts. Especially curated, composed, and edited by Pamali’s writers for the enrichment of your knowledge of Indonesian spiritual world.

Installation:

1. Buy and install the DLC
2. After installed, the DLC will be available in your local folder:
  • a. Check your Steam game Library
  • b. Right click Pamali: Indonesian Folklore Horror
  • c. Click Properties
  • d. Find Local Files
  • e. Click Browse Local Files
  • f. Your “A Book of Indonesian Ghosts” is available there.
